description: Manages a V2 topic resource within HuaweiCloud.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

CreateTime.description: Time when the topic was created.

DisplayName.description:
Topic display name, which is presented as the
name of the email sender in an email message.

Name.description: The name of the topic to be created.

PushPolicy.description:
Message pushing policy. 0 indicates that the message
sending fails and the message is cached in the queue. 1 indicates that the
failed message is discarded.

TopicUrn.description: Resource identifier of a topic, which is unique.

UpdateTime.description: Time when the topic was updated.
